body_html:
Hi folks, since we are not maintaining the CMake build after TF 1.10 (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.10.0), I'd recommend trying to reproduce this using the Bazel for Windows build. This page has instructions for building with Bazel on Windows:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources_windows.md

If you continue to have problems building using Bazel for Windows, please open a new issue with details of the problem.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources_windows.md
If you continue to have problems building using Bazel for Windows, please open a new issue with details of the problem.
body:
Hi folks, since we are not maintaining the CMake build after TF 1.10 (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.10.0), I'd recommend trying to reproduce this using the Bazel for Windows build. This page has instructions for building with Bazel on Windows:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources_windows.md

If you continue to have problems building using Bazel for Windows, please open a new issue with details of the problem.
